name: 莊惠鈞
objective:
本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力，並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。

The writing course will focus on grammar, vocabulary, and structure, while also introducing pragmatic elements to promote natural and effective writing. AI tools like ChatGPT will be integrated to enhance students' learning experience.
